title: S4 Ep5: State v. Greg Lance – Episode 3 – The Heron Farm
itunes:title: State v. Greg Lance – Episode 3 – The Heron Farm
description:
September 23, 2019 / Strange happenings at the farm of Mike Heron lead the authorities to start building a case against Greg Lance.
 
Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions and Spencer Burdette.
 
This episode was sponsored by Noom, Vistaprint and Simplisafe.
